page.title: 02SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built by Sir Robert Smirke,straight after he finished building the castle,so now it is about 160 years old. As a C.E school we go to church on festivals,e.g. Mothering Sunday, Harvest,and Christmas. The school had not been altered at all until this summer term of 1985, when the whole rear area of the school is being demolished and rebuilt.The new accomodation will include a library,kitchen,staff room and toilets.The whole school is also being redecorated and carpeted. The numbers of the school were at their lowest in 1978/9 with 24 on roll but numbers here are now at the peak of 42, with 2 full time teaching staff and 4 ancillary staff.
